reviews.review: Bom jogo, Porem esta infestado de hacks isso estrava um pouco a jogatina mas anda melhorando em geral e um √≥timo jogo.

Can get very competitive even at low ranks. Although, if playing with friends it can turn out either really good or really bad. Be prepared to lose your shit over some lucky headshot-wallbangs that the enemy who is presumably a cheater(probs not tho) gets you with. Spend hours modifying your config, mouse sensitivity, switching to lower graphics, and narrow resolution with black bars just because all the pros do it. Then realize that your game looks shit now and spend the next day readapting back to widescreen. As for advice, just try to keep it cool, and remember there is a mute option if you ever start losing it(altho use it as last resort because after all, despite what anyone else says, it is a team game where you are expected to interact with your team mates).
good game, the ranked system could use some upgrades

Its a nice game.If you play in Silver-Gold Nova you will probably play with trollers,cheaters or toxic players.If you manage to get up to Master Guardian,you will play with toxic people.Legendary Eagle is a nice rank but from Le to Global you will find very much cheaters.Over all,to play this game and get better,you need a team.
In the end,I recommend you this game because its fun and competitive.Good luck and play it fair!
